topics.body:
Lucky Star ep20 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]flies. yeah i can relate to this too. at least now we have a bug zapper for them, so now we only find maybe one or two in our house nowadays, we were pretty much infested a week ago XD 

Konata thinking about food over skill 

"wow! i could never ever smack a mosquito!" "why?" my thoughts exactly Konata 

"and if you flex your arm harder, the mosquito explodes" "NO STOP IT DON'T DO IT" my thoughts exactly Yutaka 

"YOU KEEP COMING IN WHEN I'M TAKING A BREAK" Konata. Stop being me. 

wait why did i still have to do research papers in high school but they dont >_> 

seriously, how do people actually take naps unless they have like heat stroke or something 

FIREWORKS 

they never announce anything at my fireworks shows...? 

mosquito bites everywhere 

who is this with Akira 

welp i guess it doesn't matter much because the segment decided to end 

more weird EDs[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

four episodes left? the end of the series really snuck up on me
